about_the_game:
• Wheel Smash is a shoot-'em up vehicular combat game where players enter the level, drive around picking weapons and upgrades, and blast their opponents.
  • Gather your friends in a couch and play locally in either a symmetrical non-VR mod with up to 4 local players splitscreen or asymmetrically with a 5th VR player.
  • You can also play online using Steam Remote Play. The VR player must host the game and invite the PC players to join the game.
  • The VR player can play using VR controllers or he can augment his experience with a steering wheel for full immersion.
  • PC and VR players have a different selection of vehicles optimized for their use. All vehicles can be customized in the vehicle selection menu.
  • Compatible with all major PC VR platforms supported by SteamVR
